Author: Md Al-amin
Text:
Samuda Chemical Complex Ltd.
Vacancy:
Not specific
Job Responsibilities:
Prepare Project Work Program along with Organogram after duly considering time and action plan to complete the project.
Plan & monitor the progresses of the project.
Find out ways for cost minimization which need to be included Man, Machine, Materials, Method and Money.
Any other activities as and when required by the management
Provide safety & security guidelines of the projects and taking proper measures to safeguard Man, Machine, Material, Plant and Money.
Employment Status:
Full-time
Educational Requirements:
Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Civil Engineering, Environment Engineering
Any Reputed Public University
Bangladesh University of Engineering and Technology, Rajshahi University of Engineering and Technology, Khulna University of Engineering and Technology, Dhaka University of Engineering and Technology students will get preference
Experience Requirements
At least 2 year(s)
Additional Requirements
Age 28 to 32 years
Only males are allowed to apply.

Anywhere in Bangladesh

Negotiable

Mobile bill, Provident fund, Insurance, Gratuity

Author: Ziaul H. Onim
Text:
Mentors needed for PlanetHack Institute and Technology. Payment will be given on the basis of number of classes taken per month.
The mentor would be asked to take classes on the following topics -
1. Web Development ( React Native)
2. IOS & Android Development
3. Server Management
4. Java & Python Programming
Candidates are preferred to be from CSE background.
Freshers are highly encouraged to apply. Student from final year are also welcomed to apply.
Location: Elephant Road
Interested candidates can send their CV/Resume to me (mitranimesh13@gmail.com)
I am posting this on behalf of a senior of my college.
PlanetHack Institute is due to start their journey from February.

Author: Shamsuzzoha Zoha
Text:
Dabur- Asian Consumer Care Pvt. Ltd.; An MNC is hiring at the following position!!
Position: Procurement Executive - Engineering
Location: Corporate Head Office, Dhaka
Education: B.Sc. in IP/Mechanical Engineering
Job Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Devise and use fruitful sourcing strategies
‚Ä¢ Discover profitable suppliers and initiate business and organization partnerships
‚Ä¢ Negotiate with external vendors
‚Ä¢ Approve the ordering of necessary goods and services
‚Ä¢ Finalize purchase details of orders and deliveries
‚Ä¢ Examine and test existing contracts
‚Ä¢ Track and report key functional metrics to reduce expenses and improve effectiveness
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with key persons to ensure clarity of the specifications and expectations of the company
Please apply if you have the following:
# Minimum 3 years experience
# Proven working experience as a procurement officer
# Knowledge of sourcing and procurement techniques as well as a knowledge & understanding of the market

Note:
# Worked in FMCG are encouraged to apply
E-mail: hr.bd2050@gmail.com
Application deadline: 30th January 2020
Note: For the Bangladeshi Nationals only

Text:
There is an opportunity to work in Avery Dennison as GPD Officer.Location is in Dhaka.
WHAT WE WILL BE LOOKING FOR IN YOU:
- Good written and verbal communication skills along with good PR skills.
